title: League of Legends Screensavers
body:
So I installed the LoL screensaver program onto my laptop and for some reason when browsing to select which pictures I want for my playlist there's no thumbnail appearing. It's just a black square. I remember seeing some error popping up about not copying to a path correctly or something. I should've screenshotted it but it didn't occur to me at the time. I just dismissed it instantly. Anyone else having this problem or is it just me? Any way to fix it?

p.s: I can select them and then preview the playlist and it shows up but it's annoying not knowing what I'm selecting initially.


I honestly hope that I can get some help on this because it is really bugging me right now

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try re-installing the tool and then re-opening the settings to allow all the files to redownload correctly.

Does an error appear? If so, what error?
I actually did this before as well but the error didn't show up like it did before. I might try again tonight and see if I can do anything different.
